speech 0.1.2

View control speech

Source: R/speech_view.R
speech_view.Rd

Allows to see the legislators' names with problems prior to compiling the data.

speech_view(tidy_speech, legis = character(), view = FALSE)

Arguments

tidy_speech

data.frame class puy.
legis

name of the legislator.
view

logical. If TRUE View displays datasets containing legislators' interventions (legis). By default is FALSE.

Value

data.frame.

Examples

# \donttest{
url <- "http://bit.ly/35AUVF4"
out <- speech_build(file = url)
speech_view(tidy_speech = out, legis = c("ABDALA", "LAZO"), view = FALSE)

#> # A tibble: 4 x 7
#>   legislator speech                 chamber   date       legislature id      sex
#>   <chr>      <chr>                  <chr>     <date>           <dbl> <chr> <dbl>
#> 1 ABDALA     SEÑOR ABDALA. Voto po~ COMISION~ 2019-09-17          48 35AU~     1
#> 2 LAZO       SEÑORA LAZO. Voto por~ COMISION~ 2019-09-17          48 35AU~     0
#> 3 ABDALA     SEÑOR ABDALA. Pido la~ COMISION~ 2019-09-17          48 35AU~     1
#> 4 ABDALA     SEÑOR ABDALA. Señora ~ COMISION~ 2019-09-17          48 35AU~     1
# }
